videoTitle: Retirement in France vs the rest of the EU
transcription: the French retirement age will rise from 62 to 64 causing massive strikes throughout the country is this Justified though expected years of retirement in the EU are lowest in Romania Bulgaria and Latvia this is far below the EU average of 19 years for men and 24 years for women but if we look at the top three we have Spain Luxembourg and indeed France where men can expect 24 years of retirement and women 27
